tasks.title: Setup WebSocket Connection Management
tasks.description: Implement WebSocket connection management using the Gorilla WebSocket library in Go and integrate with React frontend
tasks.details: Use Gorilla WebSocket library (github.com/gorilla/websocket) to establish and manage WebSocket connections. Implement connection state management using a Redis store for persistence. The React frontend has been updated to use WebSocket Context (`WebSocketContext.tsx`) for managing WebSocket connections, with automatic connection management, reconnection logic, and connection state tracking. The WebSocket service (`websocket.ts`) has been implemented for quiz room protocol, with message types defined for room management, quiz events, user management, and scoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for connection management using Go's built-in testing library and integrate with React frontend tests
